dtconsole

Class DengueFighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dtconsole.DengueFighter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DengueFighter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    DengueFighter class act as a controller for the Dengue Fighter Stimulator maintain a collection of site and collection of resources
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
